name: RACE ON 10
description:
RACE ON 10 is a game where you objective is click all your respective buttons before the other circle that is  game controlled does. You can get the ICE ability and shoot the opponent and freeze it up to 3 times for 3 seconds each. You can also get the show down ability and it will slow down the opponent also fore 3 seconds. The power ups will only work when you grab them accept  for the show down witch the opponent can grab and you will show down for 3 seconds.  The first person to click all 3 buttons wins.

in the menu to navigate to the level you want you have 2 options you may use A & D or the arrow keys LEFT OR RIGHT.  now to select the level simply press ENTER.

controller controls 

you must have an XBOX CONTROLLER to play this game

to move use LEFT JOY STICK

to press your buttons press A

to shoot the ice use the RIGHT TRIGER 

----------------------------------------------------------------------

KEYBORD CONTROLS

to move you can use W A S D OR THE ARROW KEYS

to shoot use SPACE BAR 

to press buttons use H
